package.name: XML_svg2image
package.summary: Converts a svg file to a png/jpeg image
package.description: Converts a svg file to a png/jpeg image with the help of apache-batik (java-program), needs therefore a php with ext/java compiled-in and the batik files from http://xml.apache.org/batik

release.notes: - tested with batik 1.0 - has almost the same api as XML_fo2pdf
